name: AP_CLAIM_IF_DX_USED_HAC
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Interface Info - Grouper - Dx Used for HAC Processing (I CLM 21856) item.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS
columns.description: Diagnosis codes that were used during hospital-acquired condition (HAC)-adjusted diagnosis related group (DRG) processing.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS_1
columns.description: The first diagnosis code that was used during HAC adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS_2
columns.description: The second diagnosis code that was used during HAC adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS_3
columns.description: The third diagnosis code that was used during HAC adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS_4
columns.description: The fourth diagnosis code that was used during HAC adjusted DRG processing.

columns.name: DX_USED_HAC_PROCESS_5
columns.description: The fifth diagnosis code that was used during HAC adjusted DRG processing.
